mapper.select: SELECT c.product_id AS "productId", c.cart_id AS "cartId", p.product_price AS "productPrice", c.product_count AS "productCount", p.product_name AS "productName" FROM cart c JOIN product p ON c.product_id=p.product_id WHERE member_id=#{memberId}
mapper.update: UPDATE cart SET product_count=#{amount} WHERE cart_id=#{cartId}
